label: WAVE Course Schedule
desc: Wave is a re-imagining of the current Wheaton College (MA) course schedule, providing a vastly improved user experience.

label: BuildsAndSkills
desc: A fun project in my spare time, this site shows a player everything they need to know for playing a given champion in League of Legends, on one page. Priority is given to clarity over added functionality, making for a quick and simple user experience.

label: GitHub Competition
desc: As an attempt at inspiring fellow classmates to code more often, this page makes a game out of GitHub's commit tracking feature, seeing how many days in a row people can remember to contribute to some repo hosted on GitHub.

label: Lexos
desc: Lexos is a online suite of tools for analyzing humanities texts using computer science. Such texts include as Shakespeare, Beowulf, etc. Lexos is used worldwide.

label: Leap Motion Rubik's Cube
desc: A project for an experimental course, we decided to use the Leap Motion Controller's uniqueness to its advantage, leveraging it to manipulate a 3D virtual Rubik's Cube.
